lines.text: You think you know me don't you?
No
You sure?
No?
That's a shame!
Mom!
Two kids... a husband... Marge though you had something great going on here... special she called it. "Why can't we be more like them? Why can't you play with your son like Reese does? Huh? Why?"

[to her kids]
Go upstairs to your room... run

[Now glaring at Catherine]
You talked to her a lot didn't you? She worshipped you didn't she? Marge thought she knew me... most of the time!
Lyle I'm sorry if we were an issue between you and Marge... but that has nothing to do with us now... please leave

Kenny used to say please a lot to me... I had to be very stern with Kenny... foolishness is bound up in the heart of a child... the rod of discipline will remove it far from him. Mother was ruining him... she was always babying him.
[shouts]
And now... now she's taking a restraining order AGAINST ME!

[Describing to Ron some of the countless victims he found in fires]
Susan Boreland July 14th 1988... full body... third degree massive inhilation... deceased... meth fire... a nine year old. Elane Brinkley November 22nd 1992... dental id... crackpot had nodded out to a gas leak with a cigarette burning... a gas leak that a worthless chink slum lord knew about... but didn't fix. Stern discipline is for he who forsakes the way... he who hates reproof... will die.

[as he kills Sandy]
Behold... blessed is the man whom god corrects... do not despise the dicipline of the almighty... he wounds... and his hands also heal... tell AL... I'm sorry

[Last defiant lines]
Kiss my...
[He snaps her neck]
How about calling the cops? Of course they may have a hard time calling you back?

[When Catherine begs him not to hurt her family]
Your idea of hurt is alot diffrent from mine!

[When asked what he wants]
I want to see your babies... I want to discipline them... I want to save them!
You blame me for what you forced me to do?

[as she shoots him in the chest]
I always knew you were a fucking coward!
You sick son of a bitch
That's a matter of opinion

[Having explained the history of Russian roulette]
I learned from one of the best... my father! Like most things in life... his luck was bound to expire... and his did
You're pathetic chink ass is making far too much noise
Have a rice day
Don't squint too hard you might go blind

[when Zach stabs him]
Good one, you little prick.
Sit down, kiddie.
My name is Zach.
I know who you are. Sit down, kiddie.
